name: Block 21
desc: New Ladies Block (NLB), People call it the princess tower. AC/non-AC singles, luxe as hell, near Student Plaza. Five-minute food court dash, 10 to academics—prime location. Kitchenette and privacy? Introvert heaven. Pricey, though—worth it for the flex.

name: Block 22
desc: Newest girls’ block, yellow deluxe vibes. People say it’s posh—AC/non-AC, great furniture, but stuffy in heat. Near Apoorva Mess, 15-minute academic walk. Two batches in, still shiny. Overpriced but cozy.
